title: Taskbar icon shows incorrect number of email
content:
Taskbar icon shows incorrect number of email. Question: Anyone else having this issue? Any fix? Today the Sent - my email address taskbar button shows 98 In Thunderbird I have only 2 new sent messages from 4-18 and none for 4-19. I have 9550 overall.

My Inbox on various days show 75 or 14 or 8 BTW I never get more then a few messages at a time so seeing 75 or 14 or 8 would never be correct.

I go to download and none show up. I have the number of Total message count already downloaded displayed and the number does not change. Any new message would also be in Bold.

I disabled the showing on the Taskbar and as an example when I go to check messages and it says 1 of 1 yet none show up.

I have even moved all my Inbox email to a subfolder and no new email will show up in the Inbox when the program says I will have lots. I checked my domain cPanel email and no new email either.
creator: davidhelp

title: Email being throttled, cannot send emails
content: I have used Thunderbird for years with no issues, suddenly can not send emails because out going server is being throttled. I have attached a screenshot of the error message. I don't know what has gone wrong or how to fix it. Any help would be appreciated thank you
creator: robertr54

title: Thunderbird Viewing message in inbox
content: In the past, when clicking on a message header, the message contents appeared in a pane below the headers. How do I get this functionality back?
creator: tjrush

title: Nefunkční tisk PDF z Thunderbird
content: Dobrý den. Po aktualizaci Thunderbird na verzi 136.x,x a novější mi přestal fungovat tisk PDF dokumentů z emailů. Dokument v okně náhledu v Thunderbird vidím, ale vytiskne se vždy prázdná stránka. Ve verzi 128.x.x bylo funkční. Také mám problém se zobrazením obsahů emailů v některých podsložkách v POP3 účtech. Seznam emailů v aplikaci vidím, ale pokud chci email otevřít, tak nevidím žádný obsah. Datový soubor se zdá OK, protože když ho otevřu třeba v MBOX Viewer, tak obsah i včetně příloh vidím. Zkusil jsem přeinstalovat, vymazat cache soubory, ale stále nefunkční. Děkuji za případnou radu.
creator: m.cuhel

title: Spam map
content: Goede morgen, Is het mogelijk de Spam map te verwijderen? En komen die mails dan in de map IN? Sinds enige tijd krijg ik geregend mails van afzenders (die me al jaren met hetzelfde email-adres en dezelfde computer contacteren) die om een of andere reden in de Spam map verdwijnen. Bovendien geeft die map niet aan (zoals bij andere inkomende mails) of er mails in die map zitten. Met dank, Guy

title: Not getting email on 1 cchannel
content: I have been using Thunderbird for several years now and it gets email for 5 email addresses. Most of these have been doing fine but one suddenly (and silently) stopped getting anything about a month ago. I have checked the settings, not that I have changed anything, and that all appears fine. I can bring up the emails via my network provider and they appear there alright. I also have a Fire tablet and I can see them there alright. So what's going on? What else can I check? Regards, Roger
creator: roger.munt

title: Your Servers Are Not Sending Out The CODES to log In !!
content: I can Not LOG In - because your security wants a CODE - Your Servers are NOT sending Out the CODES !!

title: Thunderbird email is not displaying "some" individual emails in popup view email windows
content: Thunderbird email is not displaying "some" individual emails in pop-up email windows. I get a list of emails that have come in, but when I select some of them to see their contents, they show a blank box with absolutely no content. This only applies to some emails, not all. The others display their content with no problem. And it's not always the same senders that exhibit the problem. It is totally random. I want to fix the problem since I cannot read all my emails. I did a "repair" on Thunderbird last night, but that scrambled everything, so I had to restore my PC to its last backup date, which was fortunately the day before.
creator: bob368

title: One email (of 5) is not receiving
content: To recap: I have been using Thunderbird for years. It receives 5 email channels and was working fine up until a few weeks back. I can still use it to send on that channel just not receive. Since it is Imap I can access it ok on the network providers web site (Talktalk) I can also receive it ok on an Amazon Fire tablet. I have tried turning off aspects of my antivirus (Bitdefender) but it doesn't seem to help. At the bottom edge of the Thunderbird screen I can see various sets of words which seem to indicate it is accessing the Imap channel just that nothing appears. In case it helps the email address is of the form xxxxx.xxxxx@lineone.net. Someone helpfully provided a list of suggested problem areas but they either don't apply or they seem to be ok. Regards, Roger
creator: roger.munt

title: Viewing attachments
content: Before the last Firefox update, I was able to view jpeg attachments in emails (before and after sending) in Windows phot viewer - now I can't!!?? The options it offers to view are weird - adobe, media viewer etc - rather than before where it was Paint, Picture viewer etc? - and in settings, the ascribing options are the same, and I can't find any other on offer? How can I ascribe something like Windows picture viewer to attachments? (I have managed to get t to accept Photoshop - but that is a slow-opener) Mike
creator: mike.brown2971
